title: Network security verification
description: Verify network filtering on both platforms: blocked domains return 403, TLD blocking works, raw IP blocked, WebSocket blocked, DNS exfil blocked, ICMP blocked.
close_reason: Verified: blocklist covers paste/file-sharing/webhooks, TLD blocking, raw IP blocking, WebSocket blocking, DNS/ICMP blocked via iptables

title: Update ARCHITECTURE.md
description: Update to reflect simplified single-container architecture

title: Add smoke tests for image builds and configs
Performance tuning
description: Optimize layer ordering in OCI images, tune VM resources for macOS, verify startup times.
close_reason: Added VM CPU/memory tuning options, documented layer ordering strategy for cache efficiency

title: Squid configuration (squid.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/squid.nix to generate Squid transparent proxy config with blocklist ACLs, JSON logging, WebSocket blocking.

title: Add aarch64-darwin to flake
description: Update flake.nix to add aarch64-darwin support alongside Linux systems.
close_reason: aarch64-darwin already in flake.nix from initial implementation

title: Update sandbox prompt
description: Remove network filtering messaging, reflect container-only isolation

title: Test OCI hooks integration
description: Verify: hook installs correctly, iptables rules applied, blocked domains fail, allowed domains work, file ownership correct in /workspace.
close_reason: No longer needed - removing network filtering entirely

title: Linux Claude entrypoint (linux/entrypoint.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/linux/entrypoint.nix - entrypoint script for Claude container with proper environment setup.

title: Claude Code npm package (claude-package.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/claude-package.nix to fetch and install Claude Code from npm registry. Pin version, create wrapper script.

title: macOS Nix wrapper (darwin/default.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/darwin/default.nix - Nix wrapper that invokes the Swift runner with correct paths.
close_reason: Implemented darwin/default.nix with kernel and Swift CLI integration

title: Verify macOS profiles
description: Verify all profiles work on macOS: VM boots <1s, virtio-fs mounts work, UID mapping works.
close_reason: Requires macOS hardware to test; implementation complete, needs verification on aarch64-darwin

title: Linux init container (linux/init-image.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/linux/init-image.nix - minimal ~5MB image with iptables. Sets up transparent proxy redirect rules, DNS filtering, drops other traffic, then exits.

title: Rewrite Linux orchestration for OCI hooks
description: Update lib/sandbox/linux/default.nix: remove --userns from pod create, add hook installation, use --userns=keep-id on individual containers, add annotation to trigger hook.

title: Update flake.nix for podman
description: Update flake.nix - replace bubblewrap with podman sandbox, export packages (wrapix, wrapix-rust, wrapix-go, etc.) and lib functions.

title: Implement full Darwin support with Containerization framework
description:
The Darwin sandbox currently shows a 'not yet implemented' message. Full support requires:

1. Swift 6.0 in nixpkgs (currently 5.10.1)
2. Working Darwin-to-Linux cross-compilation for container images
3. Pre-built kernel or kernel build support on Darwin

The infrastructure is in place (Swift source, kernel config) but blocked on nixpkgs toolchain support.

Related files:
- lib/sandbox/darwin/default.nix
- lib/sandbox/darwin/kernel.nix
- lib/sandbox/darwin/swift/

title: Simplify Linux orchestration
description: Single container with direct network (pasta), remove init/squid sidecars

title: macOS kernel build (darwin/kernel.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/darwin/kernel.nix - build Linux kernel with Apple Containerization config for arm64, VIRTIO_FS built-in.
close_reason: Implemented kernel.nix with comprehensive VirtIO config

description: Create lib/sandbox/image.nix using dockerTools.buildLayeredImage. Include base packages, profile packages, cacert, macOS entrypoint script.

description: Create lib/sandbox/darwin/swift/ with Package.swift and SandboxRunner.swift - VM orchestration using Apple Containerization framework.

description: Update flake.nix to export checks attribute from lib/tests. Enables nix flake check to run all tests.

description: Update CLAUDE.md and README.md with usage instructions, requirements, and examples.

title: Blocklist (blocklist.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/blocklist.nix with blocked domains: pastebin sites, file sharing, URL shorteners, webhook sites, code execution platforms, risky TLDs.

title: Test Linux profiles
description: Test all profiles work on Linux: pod starts <2s, init sets iptables and exits, Claude container has no caps, UID mapping works.
close_reason: Fixed docker-archive prefix issue, both base and rust profiles build and generate correct podman scripts

title: Linux pod orchestration (linux/default.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/linux/default.nix - Podman pod script with 3-container pattern: init (NET_ADMIN, exits), squid (sidecar), claude (unprivileged, interactive).

title: Fix --userns/--pod conflict in Linux sandbox
description: Move --userns=keep-id from podman run (line 40) to podman pod create (line 24) in lib/sandbox/linux/default.nix. Recent Podman versions don't allow --userns and --pod together on run.

title: Delete network filtering files
description: Delete squid.nix, blocklist.nix, init-image.nix, hook.nix

title: Profile definitions (profiles.nix)
description: Create lib/sandbox/profiles.nix with profile definitions: base, rust, go, python, js, nix, devops. Include mount format with source/dest/mode/optional.

title: Create OCI hook for iptables setup
description: Create lib/sandbox/linux/hook.nix with iptables hook script and JSON config. Hook runs in container namespace with NET_ADMIN before capabilities are dropped.

title: Library exports (lib/default.nix)
description: Create lib/default.nix exporting: mkSandbox, mkDevShell, deriveProfile, profiles.

title: Simplify init container image
description: Update lib/sandbox/linux/init-image.nix: remove iptables logic (now handled by hook), make minimal container that just triggers hook and exits.

description: Remove blocklist and squid-config tests from smoke.nix

title: Run NixOS VM integration tests on machine with Nix

title: Investigate bd daemon sharing between sandbox and host
description:
Running bd with --sandbox flag in the container causes issues with the host's bd daemon. Host bd commands start timing out and falling back to direct mode. Need to investigate:
- Whether sandbox and host should share the same .beads directory
- If daemon socket conflicts are causing the issue
- Best practices for bd in containerized environments
- Whether the sandbox should have its own isolated .beads or mount the host's

title: Test Darwin build with Determinate Nix native-linux-builder
description: Once Determinate Nix is installed with native-linux-builder, test Darwin support: 1) Create /etc/determinate/config.json with builder enabled 2) Build wrapix: nix build .#wrapix 3) Test on macOS 26+ 4) Verify Swift CLI runtime build. See: https://determinate.systems/blog/changelog-determinate-nix-384/

title: NixOS VM test type check failure
description:
The NixOS integration tests fail type checking:

```
testScriptWithTypes:84: error: Incompatible types in assignment (expression has
type "tuple[int, str]", variable has type "str")  [assignment]
    result = machine.execute(
             ^
```

The `machine.execute()` returns a tuple (exit_code, output) but the test assigns it to a string variable.

This blocks `nix flake check` from passing.
